name: BobCAD-CAM Document
summary: Learn about .BBCDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BobCAD-CAM software provides CAD and CAM features for Mill, Mill Turn, Lathe, Router, Waterjet, Plasma, Laser, and Wire EDM machines. Various users, from advanced aerospace engineers to amateur hobbyists, use the software to design and manufacture parts.
To create a BBCDX file, select File → New, modify the file, then select File → Save or Save as and choose the BBCDX format from the "Save as type" dropdown menu.

instructions: You can open BBCDX files with BobCAD-CAM in Windows. For example, to open a BBCDX file with BobCAD-CAM, select File → Open.

SolidWorks and Rhino programs with the BobCAM for SolidWorks and BobCAM for Rhino plugins also support BBCDX files. These utilities support all the information in the BBCDX format except the geometry.
BobCAD-CAM can convert BBCDX files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Dassault Systemes SolidWorks with BobCAM plugin
